group_1.textLeft: Everyone, I have something important to tell you@today. Please listen carefully.

group_1.textRight: What's up? Don't tell me the Union's making@a move...?

group_1.textLeft: They are. I received a report from the girls@we sent to Kamihama...
The Union...has been honing their acts for the@banquet.

group_1.textRight: Wait, huh? Is that the same banquet we were@invited to?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed it is.
At the end of the letter, there was the phrase,@"prepare your minds"...
I'd been trying to think of what that could mean,@but it all makes sense now.
The word "entertainment" in the previous sentence@likely refers to party tricks.
So that's probably what we're being asked to@"prepare" for.
We will have to show off some tricks of our own...

group_1.textRight: You want us to do WHAT?!
Ain't we the guests here?
We don't gotta "prepare" for anything.@Just ignore it.

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:102101:eyeClose_0][chara:102101:lipSynch_1]No...
We should start practicing.

group_1.textRight: Do we have to...?
What the hell...

group_1.textLeft: To be honest, I get the sense...@[chara:102101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102101:lipSynch_1]that the whole banquet is a trap.
They will expect us to show up to the party,@carefree and enjoying ourselves...
Only to stab us in the backs!
...I'm certain that's what the Tokime are plotting.

group_1.textRight: Damn... Sounds like somethin' those bitches@would do, though.
Pretty brutal...
I wonder if they think that's fine as long as it's for@the sake of Japan, too...
I-if that's true, then why do you want us to go?!
That's dangerous!

group_1.textLeft: Heh heh, we can turn their strategy against them.
If the Tokime believe they can backstab us,
then we'll have to backstab them back.

group_1.textRight: Huh?!

group_1.textLeft: While the banquet is bustling with guests,
I will surround Suitoku Temple with the forces of@Promised Blood.
The moment they begin to show signs of suspicious@activity...
We will crush their temple as I did to this paper cup.

group_1.textRight: Pretty brutal...

group_1.textLeft: I'm prepared to do whatever it takes for Futatsugi.

group_1.textRight: Oh, so to make it look like we're really enjoying the@banquet...

group_1.textLeft: I'd love for you to come up with some tricks@to show off.

group_1.textRight: Tricks, huh...? What should we do?

group_1.textLeft: Parties... My old man helps out with@'em all the time, but...
That doesn't exactly help us here.

group_1.textRight: You have a lot of parties at your place, don't you,@Yuna?
Y'know, my dad says...
...that the only people who have birthday parties@in their 50s and 60s...
...are politicians and the yakuza.

group_1.textLeft: That's a disgusting thing to say.@What a dark sense of humor.

group_1.textRight: I-I think it's great that you guys still have fun with@birthday parties!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it's quite fun. We once had a performance@by a famous musician...

group_1.textRight: Speakin' of performances...@[chara:102201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102201:motion_400][chara:102201:cheek_0][chara:102201:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102201:lipSynch_1]I can play the piano.
I'm still learnin', but I'm good enough to play at the@banquet, don't you think?

group_1.textLeft: Mm, not a bad idea.

group_1.textRight: Oh, in that case, maybe I'll do a manual speedrun@of a game~.
What do you mean, "in that case"?
Are you sayin' that playing the piano is like playing@a game?

group_1.textLeft: I mean, they're both about pressing buttons...

group_1.textRight: You're underestimating me!

group_1.textLeft: Do you have any ideas, Juri?

group_1.textRight: Nope, nothin'.@All my magic's good for is making fire.
Oh, how 'bout we make the Horse jump through@a flaming hoop?
I hate you SO much.

group_1.textLeft: I wonder what the future holds for us...
